summary:
As a marketing professional, I possess a diverse skill set and a passion for driving impactful strategies. With five years of experience in brand marketing, and working with renowned clients such as Pepsi, OPPO, and Johnny Walker.  I have developed a strong understanding of the importance of brand identity and the ability to capture customer attention and loyalty.

In addition to my brand marketing expertise, I have gained valuable experience in tech marketing during my time as a marketing intern at a tech startup. This has allowed me to stay up-to-date with the latest tech advancements and develop strategies that effectively communicate the value of tech products and services to target audiences.

My commitment to sustainability is another aspect that sets me apart in the industry. I believe in integrating sustainable practices into marketing efforts and have successfully implemented sustainability-focused campaigns. By aligning marketing strategies with environmental responsibility, I help organizations appeal to conscious consumers and build brand loyalty.

I possess strong project management skills, allowing me to efficiently plan and execute marketing campaigns. With the ability to juggle multiple tasks and deadlines while maintaining attention to detail, I ensure the seamless execution of initiatives and contribute to streamlining processes.

My expertise extends to both B2B and B2C marketing, enabling me to navigate the complexities of targeting different audiences. Crafting tailored strategies for each segment, I maximize the impact of marketing efforts and drive tangible results for businesses.

In the data-driven marketing landscape, my familiarity with various digital marketing tools, platforms, and analytics enables me to optimize campaigns and make informed decisions. By leveraging data-driven insights, I continuously refine strategies for maximum effectiveness, ensuring that my marketing approach remains innovative and impactful.

Overall, my comprehensive skill set, including brand marketing, project management, expertise in B2B and B2C marketing, as well as experience in tech marketing and sustainability, uniquely positions me to address the challenges faced by the industry. I am excited to bring these skills to opportunities in the marketing field, collaborating with like-minded professionals to overcome challenges and achieve remarkable outcomes.

Let's connect and explore how we can drive innovative and sustainable marketing initiatives, making a positive impact on both businesses and the planet.

- Communicated with industry professionals and influencers via social media to create a strong network.
profile_positions.title: Content Writer

company.name: The Students'​ Union of Tampere University of Applied Sciences (Tamko)

volunteer_experiences.description:
As an international student myself, I have had the privilege of not only excelling academically but also making an impact on the lives of others through my role as a degree tutor. One particular experience stands out when I had the opportunity to assist other international students in their journey of settling into Finland.

Having gone through the challenges of studying and adapting to a new country, I could deeply empathize with the mixed emotions these students were experiencing. Moving to a different country, with its own culture and language, can be an overwhelming experience. Recognizing the importance of a strong support system, I made it my mission to provide genuine support and help them feel a sense of belonging.

To establish a strong bond, I spent quality time engaging in heartfelt conversations with the students. I genuinely listened to their concerns and aspirations, creating a safe space where they felt comfortable sharing their thoughts. By understanding their journey, I was able to provide personalized guidance and support.

Knowing the significance of social networks, I encouraged the student to be involved within the university. I connected them with student events where they could meet fellow students and build friendships. I believed that by fostering connections, they would not only feel supported but also find a sense of purpose and belonging.

My personal experience as an international student gave me a perspective and a sense of purpose in relating to others facing similar challenges. It allowed me to draw upon my own experiences, provide guidance from a place of understanding.

This journey with the international students not only reinforced my belief in the power of empathy and support but also strengthened my commitment to making a positive impact on the lives of others. It serves as a constant reminder of the importance of creating an inclusive and supportive environment for all students, irrespective of their cultural backgrounds.
